arena

Class RobotList

  • java.lang.Object
    • arena.RobotList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Robot>

    public class RobotList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Robot>
    Auxiliar class RobotList
    Impelments a list to be used within the World to control the arena.
    Author:
    Renato Cordeiro Ferreira, Vinicius Silva

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RobotList(int nPlayers)
      Default Constructor
      Create a list of robots for 'n' players, with ROBOTS_NUM_MAX robots for each.

      • sort

        void sort()
        Sort the robot list accordingly to the robots speed. If there are conflicts, solve the randomically.
